title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 1001.3 - Amendments to application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 1001.3 - Amendments to application

State Regulations

An application made to the fund pursuant to this Part may be
amended at any time while the matter is pending before the fund. Such
amendments shall be made on appropriate forms supplied by the bureau of youth
facilities construction of the New York State Department of Social Services and
submitted to the fund through the bureau of youth facilities construction of
the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
1001.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
